Serialized Form

  • Package display

    • Class display.Display extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • gc

          GUIFocus gc
          Grid component, based on the left side of the window between the header and footer.

        • sc

          GUISidebar sc
          Sidebar component, based on the right side of the window between the header and footer.

        • fc

          GUIFooter fc
          Footer component, based on the bottom of the window.

        • hc

          GUIHeader hc
          Header component, based on the top of the window.

    • Class display.GUIFocus extends display.GUIComponent implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • TERRAIN_TILESET

          java.awt.Image TERRAIN_TILESET
          The terrain tileset to use.

        • tileMargins

          java.util.Map<K,V> tileMargins
          Hash table that links characters to their representative tile images within the given tileset.

        • SELECTOR_YELLOW

          java.awt.Image SELECTOR_YELLOW
          The crosshair to use.

        • grid

          Tile[][] grid
          The grid component used as a basis for updating the display. Most (not all) of the time, this exactly reflects the grid that is in the control.

        • squareSize

          int squareSize
          The size of each individual square when it is drawn, in pixels.

    • Class display.GUIFooter extends display.GUIComponent implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • messages

          java.lang.String[] messages
          The list of messages to write to the component.

    • Class display.GUIHeader extends display.GUIComponent implements Serializable

    • Class display.GUISidebar extends display.GUIComponent implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • combatantFocus

          Combatant combatantFocus
          The combatant that is being focused on. If the component is in mode "CombatantDisplay", this combatant's stats is shown on the sidebar. TODO: reciprocation is dangerous, switch out of Combatant.
